verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:16
verses.text: And her husband went with her along weeping behind her to Bahurim. Then said Abner unto him, Go, return. And he returned.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:17
verses.text: And Abner had communication with the elders of Israel, saying, Ye sought for David in times past to be king over you:

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:18
verses.text: Now then do it: for the Lord hath spoken of David, saying, By the hand of my servant David I will save my people Israel out of the hand of the Philistines, and out of the hand of all their enemies.
